SEARCH
Package com.bcb.vetra.controllers

Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
com.bcb.vetra.controllers.PatientController
@PreAuthorize("isAuthenticated()") @RestController @RequestMapping("/patients") public class PatientController extends Object
Controller for patients.

This class is responsible for handling all HTTP requests related to patients.

  • Method Details

    • getAllByUsername

      @GetMapping public List<Patient> getAllByUsername(Principal principal)
      Gets all patients for the currently logged in user.
      Parameters:
      principal - The currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      A list of all patients for the currently logged in user.

    • getAll

      @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'DOCTOR\')") @GetMapping("/all") public List<Patient> getAll()
      Gets all patients.
      Returns:
      A list of all patients.

    • get

      @GetMapping("/{patientId}") public Patient get(@PathVariable int patientId, Principal principal)
      Gets a patient by its ID. Verifies permission by calling the access control service. If a user owns the patient, or if they are an admin or doctor, they can access the patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      principal - The currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      The patient with the given ID.

    • create

      @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'DOCTOR\')") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping public Patient create(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Patient patient)
      Creates a new patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient to create.
      Returns:
      The created patient.

    • update

      @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'DOCTOR\')") @PutMapping("/{patientId}") public Patient update(@PathVariable int patientId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid Patient patient)
      Updates a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to update.
      patient - The updated patient.
      Returns:
      The updated patient.

    • delete

      @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @DeleteMapping("/{patientId}") public void delete(@PathVariable int patientId)
      Deletes a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to delete.
